scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm i && cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ../admin && npm i
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../admin && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
